unusual 'squeaky shoe' call (possibly mating?) see also XC150617 - one bird going back and forth on horizontal branch soon joined by two others.  first call starts 2 secs into recording and is immediately mimicked by greater-racket tailed drongo,  calls continue until end of recording where there  are 2 'standard' high-pitched single-notes normally heard from this species
